{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = 300Mbps Wi-Fi AV500 Powerline Extender |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WPA4220.html |sp = https://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/TL-WPA4220/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WPA4220 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = AV500 |type = Powerline Access Point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7TLWPA4220V1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2052500094 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8196C; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra |cpu1_type_rev = RLX4181 |cpu1spd = 390 |cpu2chip1 = Atheros;AR7420; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,X86, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = <!-- CPU1 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM638165TS-6G; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C0:4A:00, C4:6E:1F |oui = C0:4A:00, C4:6E:1F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.15 |pwr_conn = AC (direct)
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HomePlug AV |addchip = HomePlug AFE/Line Driver;Atheros;AR1540;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 172.10.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-Link_XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/28/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 60 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00LEFYTMK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00HSQAIQU |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Web GUI: http://tplinkplc.net
*TP-LINK TL-WPA4220 KIT (TL-WPA4220(EU) - QCA7420) :*TP-LINK TL-WPA4220 (2x RJ-45, 4x LED, Button) :*TP-LINK TL-PA4010 (1x RJ-45, 3x LED)
===Revision=== {{See also|Talk:TP-LINK TL-WPA4220}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32386-tp-link-tl-wpa4220kit-300mbps-wi-fi-range-extender-av500-powerline-edition-reviewed ''TP-LINK TL-WPA4220 KIT'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :FCC ID: TE7TLWPA4220V1 (11/28/2013) :PCB ID: 2052500094 (1319) - v1 (?) :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8196C SoC :Flash: ''Winbond'' (2MB, SPI) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM638165TS-6G (8MB) :Wi-Fi: [[Realtek]] RTL8192CE (2x2 802.11bgn) :PowerLine: [[Atheros]] AR7420 HomePlug AV MAC/PHY ::[[Atheros]] AR1540 HomePlug Line Driver IC
[[Category:English Documentation]]
